headline: Aris Water (NYSE:ARIS) Q1 Earnings: Leading The Environmental and Facilities Services Pack
summary: As the Q1 earnings season wraps, let’s dig into this quarter’s best and worst performers in the environmental and facilities services industry, including Aris Water (NYSE:ARIS) and its peers.
